item.description:
Come to the biggest swing dance of the year this Saturday night in Watertown, as the Beantown Swing Orchestra reenacts some of the scenes from "Bachelor No. 2" which it filmed last week with Kate Hudson, Dane Cook, and Jason Biggs. This will be a slightly different crowd than the Concord dances, and a lot larger (250+). You'll also see some hardcore Lindy Hoppers who will be doing some classic line dances such as the Shim Sham and the Big Apple. A beginner swing lesson will be taught by Roger Weiss from 8 to 9pm, and the band will play from 9pm to midnight. The band's lineup will be the most talented one ever so the musicianship is going to be incredible!

More information about this dance series is at www.bostonswingdance.com.

group.name: The Boston-Area Swing/Blues Dance Meetup Group

item.name: Swing Dance in Watertown
